item.title: How do I Manage my State with React
item.description: Intro SML -> State management library -> like Redux or Mobx P.S This is just my opinion, this is not a best practice guide etc, just what I found best for the app I built recently. When building an app with react or react-native I had lots of options. One of the most important option was how to manage state, where should I put it, how to use it, and lastly how make it easy to maintain.
